name: Promotion Class: Inquisitor
description:
Role: Healing

As fire can punish the wicked, it can also heal the faithful. While this worshiper wields both forms of the flame, they rely on their healing to keep the faithful fighting.

Stat Adjustments:
Support Power +525
Fire Damage +5%
Fire Damage Cap +5%
Final Mitigations Cap +10%

Traits Granted:
Mail Armor Proficiency
Book Mastery

Enhancements:
Fervor: Now has a reduced cooldown and adds a Group heal to those within 30m.
Fire Tornadoes: Now tornadoes also heal friendly targets they hit.
Hellfire Aura: Now with increased radius, also heals allies within the radius.


WARNING: Purchasing this talent promotes you to the Inquisitor promotion class and prevents access to the Sanctifier and Fanatic promotion classes.
